org.ambraproject.wombat.controller

Class SiteResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ambraproject.wombat.controller.SiteResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.web.method.support.HandlerMethodArgumentResolver

    public class SiteResolver
extends Object
implements org.springframework.web.method.support.HandlerMethodArgumentResolver
    Bean that resolves requests to the sites that the application hosts.

    The sites themselves, and the definitions of how to resolve requests to individual sites, are encapsulated in the SiteSet bean. This object exposes them to the view layer.

      Resolve the site from the request and store it in the model as "site".

      Determine which site a request is for.
      boolean supportsParameter(org.springframework.core.MethodParameter parameter)
      Apply to every controller parameter annotated with @SiteParam, which should be of type Site.

      • resolveSite

        public Site resolveSite(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Determine which site a request is for. Applies the SiteRequestSchemes defined in the SiteSet bean. Returns null if no site is matched.
        Parameters:
        request - a request from the web
        Returns:
        the site for the request, or null
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if more than one SiteRequestScheme matches the request
